title: Intel InvestorUpdate: CES 2026 Spotlights 18A Progress, Core Ultra Series 3 and AI PC Push
description: Intel (NASDAQ:INTC) used its CES 2026 event to outline how the company is positioning its client and edge roadmap around what executives described as a strategic inflection point for AI computing. Speakers highlighted progress on Intel’s 18A manufacturing technology, provided details on the upcoming Core Ultra Series 3 platform, and emphasized a broader push to [...]

title: AI Wearables Set to Eclipse Stagnant Smartphones by 2030
description: Smartphones are stagnating with plateauing sales and innovation, frustrated users seeking alternatives. AI-powered wearables like smart glasses and rings offer hands-free, ambient interactions, backed by industry bets from Meta and Google. Despite challenges like privacy and battery life, experts predict wearables will dominate by 2030, redefining digital connectivity.

title: How a New AI Model Can Identify High-Risk Social Media Videos Before They Go Viral
description: Researchers at the University of Delaware developed an AI model that can predict and flag potentially harmful videos before they go viral. Their new study found that short-form videos can trigger suicidal thoughts among vulnerable viewers, and shows how their tool would help flag them.

title: Why Nvidia's new Rubin platform could change the future of AI computing forever
description: At CES 2026, Nvidia unveiled Rubin, a new AI supercomputing platform that aims to accelerate the adoption of LLMs among the public.
